name: Melee
description:
In 2040, an unknown colorless inert gas emerged on Silent Island, which appeared randomly and gradually and soon covered the island, making the whole island uninhabitable; in 2045, Silent Island is acquired by Company Theron-H, a worldwide-focused, pan-entertainment Company, which is investing heavily to turn silent island into an open arena of entertainment, and by 2050, the Holographic mech technology of Theron-H will be ready for use on Silent Island and gave the event its official name: Melee.

clean accurate weapon

unique flight system

explosive force weapon

Battle aboard aircraft

power core augmentation system

holographic sci-fi armor

compete with players all over the world

Excellent game optimization, high quality, high frame rate
